mapper.update: /* batch.initProductSeq */ UPDATE lab_sequences SET CURRENT_VAL = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND SEQ_NAME = 'product_code_seq'
/* batch.initMenuSeq */ UPDATE lab_sequences SET CURRENT_VAL = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND SEQ_NAME = 'menu_code_seq'
/* batch.initSeq */ UPDATE lab_sequences SET CURRENT_VAL = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND (SEQ_NAME = 'product_code_seq' OR SEQ_NAME = 'menu_code_seq' OR SEQ_NAME = 'material_code_seq')
mapper.select: /* batch.selectHrOrgMaster */ SELECT OBJTID , OBJTTX , TOBJID , SEQUEN , PRIORT , CSTCNT , BUKRS FROM V_HR1010 WHERE 1 = 1

/* batch.selectHrUserMaster */ SELECT EMPNUM , SBTYPE , IPSAIL , RETIRE , NAMEKO , BIRDAY , ORGAID , TITLCD , LEVLCD , RESPCD , JOBOID , EMAIL , MOBILE , OFFICE , EMPGB1 , EMPGB2 , EMSTAT , SEXGUB , CSTCNT , BUKRS , WORKCD FROM V_HR2000 WHERE 1 = 1
/* batch.selectHrCodeMaster */ SELECT CDTYPE , CDVALU , CDTEXT , SEQUEN , USEDYN FROM V_HR9001 WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: /* batch.insertHrUser */ INSERT INTO lab_user( USER_ID , USER_NAME , REG_DATE , EMAIL , IS_ADMIN , IS_DELETE , THEME , IS_LOCK , ROLE_CODE , ORGAID , TITLCD , LEVLCD , RESPCD , EMSTAT) SELECT user_data.* FROM ( WITH ORG_INFO AS ( SELECT lih.*, org.OBJTTX, org.TOBJID, org.level FROM lab_interface_hr2000 lih, ( WITH RECURSIVE org_path(OBJTID, OBJTTX, TOBJID, SEQUEN, PRIORT, CSTCNT, BUKRS, level) AS ( SELECT hr1010.OBJTID , hr1010.OBJTTX , hr1010.TOBJID , hr1010.SEQUEN , hr1010.PRIORT , hr1010.CSTCNT , hr1010.BUKRS , 1 as level FROM lab_interface_hr1010 hr1010 WHERE hr1010.OBJTID = '10000065' UNION ALL SELECT hr1010_tmp.OBJTID , hr1010_tmp.OBJTTX , hr1010_tmp.TOBJID , hr1010_tmp.SEQUEN , hr1010_tmp.PRIORT , hr1010_tmp.CSTCNT , hr1010_tmp.BUKRS , op.level+1 as level FROM lab_interface_hr1010 hr1010_tmp INNER JOIN org_path op ON hr1010_tmp.TOBJID = op.OBJTID ) SELECT OBJTID, OBJTTX, TOBJID, SEQUEN, PRIORT, CSTCNT, BUKRS, level FROM org_path )org WHERE 1 = 1 AND lih.ORGAID = org.OBJTID ) SELECT EMPNUM , NAMEKO , sysdate() , EMAIL , 'N' as IS_ADMIN , 'N' as IS_DELETE , 'theme02' as THEME , 'N' as IS_LOCK , 1 as ROLE_CODE , ORGAID , TITLCD , LEVLCD , RESPCD , EMSTAT FROM ORG_INFO )user_data ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE USER_NAME = VALUES(USER_NAME) , EMAIL = VALUES(EMAIL) , IS_ADMIN = VALUES(IS_ADMIN) , IS_DELETE = VALUES(IS_DELETE) , THEME = VALUES(THEME) , IS_LOCK = VALUES(IS_LOCK) , ROLE_CODE = VALUES(ROLE_CODE) , ORGAID = VALUES(ORGAID) , TITLCD = VALUES(TITLCD) , LEVLCD = VALUES(LEVLCD) , RESPCD = VALUES(RESPCD) , EMSTAT = VALUES(EMSTAT)
